original_title: Break: A Tribute To My Home
overview: As we grow up we form deep, long lasting bonds with the place we call home. But sometimes we are forced to let go of the places we know and love. Iâ€™m this short film, digital content creator Oliver Giles pays respects to the wonderful Northern California coast as he says goodbye to the home he grew up in.
tagline: Sometimes the hardest thing to do is let go
title: Break: A Tribute To My Home
